name: Jyoti Electronics
tag_list: rf, microwave, cst, ifen, navigation-simulator, test-receiver, amplifier, rf-absorber, mician, simulation-software, jyoti-electronics, jyoti-microsystems, rajendra-agarwal, gps, galileo, irnss, satsoft, antenna-design, antenna
overview:
Jyoti Electronics is a recognized techno-trading house based in India (Ahmedabad), serving Indian market since the last 35 years, diversified towards marketing of RF/Microwave design software & hardware.

We provide simulation softwares like CST - a full wave 3D simulation software, MICIAN- filter, antenna, multiplexer, etc. designing, antenna design and analysis, multi beam antenna designs, signal integrity and EMC/EMI analysis of cable harnesses, simulation of Signal and power integrity, Microwaves & RF, EDA/Electronics, thermal and mechanical stress analysis.

Also high power RF components, microwave tuning elements, RF NAVIGATION CONSTELLATION SIMULATOR, GPS/GALILEO NAVIGATION SOFTWARE RECEIVER, GPS/GALILEO RECEIVER PROFESSIONAL SERIES, microwave waveguide componenets and subsystems, Wide Band Telemetry receivers, Airborne & Ground RF sub systems, EMI Shielding, RF Magnetron Sputtering System, Standard Filters for Ka-band earth station, Customized components for 1 to 40 GHz.
